title: Drawing, "Study.  Colombian landscape "Recollections of a view from a hill / near Cartago.  Sketch:  A woman carrying water.", July 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff-colored paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite?, at bottom right:  "Recollection of a view from a hill near Cartago - July - 1853 -.
description: Horizontal view over hills in the foreground, a valley with a town in the middle distance, looking towards mountain ranges in the rear with clouds. A house is shown in the left foreground.  Sketch  at top right: A woman with a jar upon her head, shown in profile, turned toward left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Study.  Colombian landscape "Recollections of a view from a hill / near Cartago.  Sketch:  A woman carrying water.", July 1853.
July 1853. Graphite, brush and white gouache on buff-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-75.
